entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ToImmutableDictionary for KVP and Tuples #86472
  • [wasm] Perf run failure for AOT : `wasm-validator error in function System_Threading_Channels_System_Collections_Generic_Deque_1_T_GSHAREDVT_get_IsEmpty] unexpected false: local.get index must be small enough` #86471
    8.0.0
  • UnsafeRelaxedJsonEscaping escapes too much #86463
  • ILLink produces invalid IL metadata with -b switch and Save assembly mode #86462
  • Safer failure with COM/C++/vtable interop and RTTI #86458
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: IConfigurationRoot should derive from IDisposable #86456
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add async version of ThreadStart and ParameterizedThreadStart callback #86454
  • Unsafe.BitCast/As does not remove stack spilling for custom SIMD type #86448
  • [browser] configure rollup to minify internal method names #86447
    8.0.0
  • Feature request: treat Memory/ReadOnlyMemory<T> as T[] in System.Text.Json #86442
    Future
  • Process terminated. Infinite recursion during resource lookup within System.Private.CoreLib - Argument_InvalidResourceCultureName #86441
  • Add a `JsonTypeInfoResolver.WithModifier` extension method #86440
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Implement support for `UnsafeAccessorAttribute` #86438
    8.0.0
  • HttpClient returns "System.IO.IOException: The response ended prematurely" when run in a container #86434
  • Exception in Dispose() prevents disposing of all other services #86426
  • HTTPClient throw many System.IO.IOException in .NET6 & .NET7 #86422
  • Improve debugging experience of ClaimsPrincipal #86421
    8.0.0
  • Behavior difference in JsonSerializer between .NET7 and .NET8 p4 #86419
    8.0.0
  • Test failure System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.EnumConverterTests.NegativeEnumValue_CultureInvariance #86417
  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessWaitingTests.WaitChain #86416
    Future

Closed

  • CI failure: Could not find a chrome snapshot #86451
  • Failure when building self-hosted NativeAOT compiler changes with 8.0 Preview 2 SDK #83695
    8.0.0
  • Make call-counting, class probes, block counters cache-friendly #72387
    8.0.0
  • [Breaking change] Changing EventSource OnEventCommand to be consistent #84586
  • Assertion failed in Task.UnsafeSetContinuationForAwait #86444
  • Test Failure - `jit64_do.0.1` #85590
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Math.Clamp<T> #85979
  • Proposal Max, Min for IComparable #18481
    Future
  • ZipFile hangs when encountering named pipe #85097
  • Vector256.Shuffle() produces bad results in release mode #86432
    8.0.0
  • Convert not grace handling boundary values of integer types when converting from floating point representations #86439
  • JIT: Assertion failed '((tree->gtFlags & GTF_VAR_DEF) == 0) && (tree->GetLclNum() == lclNum) && tree->gtVNPair.BothDefined()' during 'VN based copy prop #84619
    8.0.0
  • System.PlatformNotSupportedException: Algorithm 'RC2' is not supported on this platform. #85019
    8.0.0
  • Cannot restore on s390x #77879
    8.0.0
  • .NET 6 Android, The certificate data cannot be read with the provided password, the password may be incorrect #86349
  • Regressions in System.Buffers.Text.Tests.Base64EncodeDecodeInPlaceTests #86336
  • Remove Roslyn-Reflection helper abstraction from System.Text.Json source generator #79533
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add body content to HttpRequestException #86095
  • Assertion failed 'assertion->op2.HasIconFlag()' #86398
    8.0.0
  • [BUG] .NET acts weirdly on wrapped native libraries #86224
  • Test failure tracing/runtimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource.sh #86233
    8.0.0
  • Enable source-build pre-built detection #81468
  • .Net 6 System.Process.Start cannot launch a self contained .net core 2.2 web app #86368
  • Reduce unnecessary allocations in TLS handshake (windows) #68951
    8.0.0
  • tracing.runtimeeventsource times out with PGO enabled and R2R disabled #86253
    8.0.0
  • [MSVC] a mistake in valuenum.h #86372
    8.0.0
  • Test failure _Vector64_ro::JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.General._Vector64.Program.WidenInt64() #86234
    8.0.0
  • Blazor WASM Hosted app fails to run when Nuget Packages upgraded to 8.0.0-preview-4.23260.4 #86364

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix marking of saved assemblies #86474
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Allow overbudget for small methods #86473
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Optimize constant i2/i4 shuffles in jiterpreter #86470
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • [wasm] Implement I2 and I4 shuffles in the jiterpreter #86469
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2183518 #86468
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] Warn if StringMarshalling doesn't match base and warn if base interface cannot be generated #86467
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Allow using active host context in hostfxr_get_runtime_delegate #86460
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Rename a couple model specs for config binding generator #86459
    area-Extensions-Configuration, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • FileConfigurationProvider.Dispose should dispose FileProvider when it owns it #86455
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Ensure that the shuffle zero mask copies all bits #86453
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Fix endless loop in illink analyzer #86449
    area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Refactor name convention #86446
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • remove [DebuggerDisplayAttribute] from ref assemblies #86443
    area-System.Xml
  • [LoongArch64] Fix some bugs in the test set 'System.Runtime.Tests' for loongarch64. #86435
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Stop using LocalizationResources within framework #86430
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Baseline a couple more JIT tests #86429
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make merged test wrappers single file friendly #86428
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Remove inconsistent comments in Convert.cs #86425
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Add debugging attributes to System.Security.Claims types #86424
    area-System.Security, 8.0.0

Merged

  • Add an undocumented switch to allow controlling the preferred vector width emitted implicitly by the JIT #86457
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix scanning synchronized methods #86427
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fill out array bounds in metadata transform #86313
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #86359
    Servicing-approved
  • [6.0-staging] Update some Windows server helix queues for mono #86355
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, runtime-mono
  • Exclude System.* reference assemblies in ILCompiler.Build.Tasks #86423
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Switch RhConfig from TCHAR to char #86393
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Enable v128 and PackedSimd in the interpreter #85920
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm] Update jiterpreter documentation #86461
    area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Make host look for RID-specific assets via a known list by default #84100
    breaking-change, area-Host
  • Remove workaround for fixed Roslyn bug #86464
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Remove noisy assert from Task #86445
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • Remove call to morph on hoisted trees #86450
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Vectorize the CRC64 implementation #85221
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Clean various aspects of config binding generator up #86420
    area-Extensions-Configuration, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Fix GCStress timeouts in JIT/jit64 #85040
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Fix alignment problems with calls and simd types in unoptimized methods #86433
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Zip.Unix: don't hang when creating zip file from directory with named pipe. #85301
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • add pre-built detection #86151
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix issue with hoisting and copy prop interaction #85493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Set WasmEnableWebcil to true by default #86330
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix Base64 decoding regressions from whitespace handling #86396
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance
  • [browser] logging cleanup #86431
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Remove System.Reflection wrappers from the STJ source generator. #86334
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` indexing #85254
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Fix assertprop assert for missing handle flag #86409
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix deadlock in NativeRuntimeEventSourceTest #86370
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Disable DllImportSearchPathsTest and StartupHookTests on mobile #86269
    needs-area-label
  • [browser] Describe ES6 modules #86381
    documentation, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Convert JIT/CodeGenBringUpTests to a merged test group #85847
    test-enhancement, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • avoid ProtocolToken allocations in TLS handshake #86163
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.0
  • Make IDerivedTest.CallBaseInterfaceMethod_EnsureQiCalledOnce trim-friendly #86397
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, test-enhancement
  • Add natstepfilter to skip over object allocators #86418
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Do not assert RyuJIT if InitializeArray cannot be expanded #86373
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove extraneous VN code #86407
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delay reg free for tbx_1reg #86292
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add basic support for StringMarshalling in GeneratedComInterface #86404
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation

Updated

  • Move the GCC and CLR Tools Unit Tests legs to use the global build template #86411
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Isolating JITDbl2Ulng helper changes #86175
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add request metrics to System.Net.Http #85447
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Enable option to use the Windows ThreadPool #85373
    area-System.Threading
  • [draft][browser] threads experiment #86278
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #86358
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [WIP] Make the RefreshMemoryLimit API public #85549
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Share UTF8 converters between coreclr and mono #85558
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][aot] Enabling AOT wrappers for virtual delegates #85643
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Initial work to enable EventPipe in Linux #86226
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Enable EVEX feature: embedded broadcast for Vector128/256/512.Add() in limited cases #84821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • enable TieredPGO by default #86225
    NO-MERGE, area-TieredCompilation-coreclr
  • SHA3 #84132
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] Exploit unallocated zero page to remove null checks in jiterpreter #86403
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Read StartDiskNumber as uint32 #83923
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • Add missing OL releases to RID graph #81115
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Update System.CommandLine version #84229
    NO-MERGE, area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Upgrade all VMs to AMD64 Ubuntu 22.04 #86194
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix async XsdValidatingReader to not use synchronious IO #84888
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Upgrade build to use .NET 8 Preview 4 SDK #86408
    area-Infrastructure
  • Enable event pipe tests in NativeAOT CI run #86389
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Only call Free in unmanaged->managed stubs when ownership has been transfered to the callee #86415
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Fix mapping of redeclared type parameters #86353
    area-Tools-ILLink, needs-area-label
  • [mono][mini] Fix conversion from r4/r8 to native u #85964
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [RISC-V] Fix receiving of 2nd register in struct #86144
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Allow the user to control the MaxVectorTBitWidth and PreferredVectorBitWidth #85551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Intrinsify Unsafe.Read/Write, handle struct BitCast #85562
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Generate jiterpreter feature detect modules dynamically #86401
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Stop setting HelixResultsDestinationDir #86413
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Dynamic heap count #86245
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Use cinv instead of csel when possible #84926
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update GetElement and ToScalar to lower IND, LCL_FLD, and LCL_VAR specially #86400
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][tasks] Extract EmitWasmBundle into generic EmitBundle task and enable bundling in mono self-contained library #84191
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add version info to NativeAOT apps #79623
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [OSX] HybridGlobalization implement compare native function #85965
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • Start dynamic heap count work #84168
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add ProcessStartInfo constructor that accepts IEnumerable<string> arguments #86346
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Exclude unused bundle files in AppleAppBuilder #86316
    area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] delete the rsGetRsvdReg() for LA64. #86319
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add support for types with parameterized ctors to config binder gen #86365
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [mono][tests] Enable runtime tests on Interpreter #86375
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.0
  • Clone files on OSX-like platforms when possible, instead of copying the whole file #79243
    area-System.IO, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution
  • [mono][wasm] marshal-ilgen is dropped when not required #86035
    NO-MERGE, area-Build-mono
  • Attempt to fix unfailing helix test run when testResults.xml are missing #86342
    area-Infrastructure
  • [browser] introduce sourcemaps #86152
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Exclude things which broken on Loongarch #78850
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Fix warnings found with CA1861 Avoid constant arrays as arguments #86229
    area-Meta
  • Restore missing API from Extensions #85846
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging
  • Haiku: Configuration support #86391
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
